content: imagine the joy of seeing your little one snuggled up in a cute hat crocheted by yourself now is the perfect time to learn how to make this beautiful bear hat using my baby bear beanie crochet pattern i wrote this simple baby hat crochet pattern in 6 different sizes preemie newborn 0-3 months 3-6 months 6-12 months and 1-3 year old so you can easily make the size that will fit your little one perfectly details skill level begginer crochet skills and knowledge finished size available in 6 different sizes - preemie newborn 0-3 months 3-6 months 6-12 months and 1-3 year old gauge 4 x 4 15 half_double_crochet sts x 12 half_double_crochet row terminology us crochet terminology notes only available in english this baby bear beanie crochet pattern consists of - step by step pattern descriptions including lots of photos for guidance - information about materials and equipment needed - list of abbreviations used in the pattern - links to helpful video tutorials materials needed - i recommend using worsted weight yarn #4 = aran for the sizing to fit - this pattern will work with 100% acrylic yarn 100% cotton yarn or a blend of acrylic and cotton i used - worsted weight yarn #4 = aran - 100% acrylic yarn - universal yarn uptown worsted equipment needed - crochet hook i used 5mm = h/8 but refer to the instructions on your yarn label if using different weight of yarn - scissors yarn needle stitch marker tape measure you may sell the crochet items you made using this crochet baby beanie hat pattern as long as you credit me as the original designer
